skillTree.name: Barded Ithilmar Steed
skillTree.description: An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.

skillTree.name: Great Stag
skillTree.description: With its magnificent frame and the great plumes of steam of its snorting breath, the Great Stag instils unflinching valour into those who ride it.

skillTree.name: Great Eagle
skillTree.description: Fly on your wings, like an eagle. Touch the sun. Track the foe, ambush, and defeat.

skillTree.name: Marked by Kurnous
skillTree.description: The God of the Hunt freely gifts his deific zeal for war to all nobles deemed worthy of their responsibilities to Athel Loren.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +25% during forest battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Kinband Captain
skillTree.description: Longbow kinbands are regimented and resourceful when defending their forest homes, advancing and retreating like leaves in a storm.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Arrow of Kurnous
skillTree.description: When the arrow flies farther, it may kill sooner, which is vital in the Hunt.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Fleetfinger
skillTree.description: Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.

skillTree.name: Bottomless Quiver
skillTree.description: Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Endurance of the Oak
skillTree.description: Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.

skillTree.name: Impenetrable Bark
skillTree.description: Using the forest itself as a shield, this Lord is protected by their devotion to Athel Loren.

skillTree.name: Tempered Rigour
skillTree.description: When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.

skillTree.name: Violent Delights
skillTree.description: There is no greater thrill than to be in the midst of battle, slaughtering in the forest's name.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Born to Ride
skillTree.description: Perfectly at home in the saddle, this warrior can ride at full-pelt through terrain others would struggle with on foot.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -10% for cavalry units
	(Hero's army)
Attribute: Strider when mounted on an Elven Steed or Great Stag

Attribute: Strider for cavalry units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Death from Above
skillTree.description: Following the example of the Doomstar, this warrior specializes in devastating, demoralizing strikes from the sky.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Terror when mounted on a Great Eagle

Attribute: Causes Fear for Hawk Rider units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Touched by Loec
skillTree.description: A member of the Wardancer kindred, this warrior fights to Loec's silent song.

effects.description: Ability: The Shadows Coil (when not using a mount)
Attribute: Stalk (when not using a mount)

Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Wardancer and Bladesinger units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Wildwood Veteran
skillTree.description: This warrior has patrolled the borders of the Wildwood, facing down horrors unknowable and standing unfazed.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Wildwood Ranger units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +2 for Wildwood Ranger units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +2 for Wildwood Ranger units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Dance of Loec
skillTree.description: This ritualistic war dance requires neither rhythm nor order, enabling evasion of the enemyâ€™s clumsy attacks, and lethal counterattacks.

skillTree.name: Possessed by the Trickster God
skillTree.description: Once consumed by Loecâ€™s aspect, one can instinctively evade attack through trickery, mimicking his deception of the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Possessed by the Trickster God"

skillTree.name: Renowned
skillTree.description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe Iâ€™ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: Iâ€™ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Great Orator
skillTree.description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Damage Building
skillTree.description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Unit
skillTree.description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Ariel's Chosen
backgroundSkills.description: Those whom the Mage Queen has favoured fight as if powered by her hand.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

Melee attack: +2 during forest battles
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Talon of Kurnous
backgroundSkills.description: The first arrow of battle must fly truest.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Chosen of Asuryan
backgroundSkills.description: Atop a great pyramid in the highest heaven, Asuryan watches over the world alone and has never been seen by mortals.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Great Eagle and Hawk Rider units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Hoeth Wisdom
backgroundSkills.description: Whatever the motivation, legend tells that when Asuryan learned of Hoeth's actions, he rebuked the Lord of Wisdom, and in punishment, set much of Hoeth's great library ablaze.

backgroundSkills.name: Blessing of Isha
backgroundSkills.description: As the goddess of nature, Isha taught the Elves how to care for the land and gain a plentiful harvest.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Ways of Ladrielle
backgroundSkills.description: By tradition, she is the only goddess to any longer walk the mortal world, and there are tales of her coming to the aid of those lost amidst the mists of Yvresse or upon the trackless ocean.

backgroundSkills.name: Light of Lileath
backgroundSkills.description: It is claimed that she reads the intention written in the heart of every elf and judges them not by their deeds, but by their hearts desire.

backgroundSkills.name: Blade of Loec
backgroundSkills.description: The Elf legends tell that Loec often saves the souls of the dead from Slaanesh by tricking the Dark Prince out of his prize.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(enemy armies in region)

backgroundSkills.name: Vaul's Will
backgroundSkills.description: Enslaved to Khaine's will, Vaul is forced to make weapons of extraordinary power for the War God's eternal battle against the great enemy.
